pageProduct.name: The Hemp Company Pink Pomelo Body Whip 250g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Body Cream made with Hemp Seed Oil

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. Not for internal use

Common Uses

To add moisture to dry skin

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Isopropyl Myristate, Cyclomethicone, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Searate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Extract, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Dimethicone, Xanthan Gum, Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Hydroxide

Directions

Apply and gently massage into skin until absorbed.
